data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Expense Acc.'
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_ACCOUNT
  as select from    zetr_t_exp120                as Main
    left outer join zetr_t_exp120                as Text           on  Text.bukrs = Main.bukrs
                                                                   and Text.ctype = Main.ctype

    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_CST_TYP           as CostType       on CostType.Ctype = Main.ctype

    left outer join I_CostCenterText             as CostCenterText on  CostCenterText.CostCenter = Text.kostl
                                                                   and CostCenterText.Language   = $session.system_language


    left outer join I_GlAccountTextInCompanycode as GlAccountText  on  GlAccountText.GLAccount   = lpad(
      Text.saknr, 10, '0'
    )
                                                                   and GlAccountText.CompanyCode = Main.bukrs
                                                                   and GlAccountText.Language    = $session.system_language


    left outer join I_CompanyCode                as CompanyCode    on CompanyCode.CompanyCode = Main.bukrs



{
        @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
  key   Main.bukrs as Bukrs,
        @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'Description' ]
  key   Main.ctype as Ctype,
        CompanyCode.CompanyCodeName,
        CostType.Description,
        CostCenterText.CostCenterName,
        @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CostCenterName' ]
        Text.kostl as Kostl,
        GlAccountText.GLAccountName,
        @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'GLAccountName' ]
        Text.saknr as Saknr

}
